name: Fen Pilsk
description: The last survivor in Pansoph. He sells fabrics from his cart near Lunacrest Bridge.

dialogs.responseText: Why, hello! Been a while since I've seen anyony alive around here. Care to buy some fine fabrics?

I don't suppose you've noticed the orange sky and ominous tower in the distance? Everyone's dead. This used to be a thriving community, I was an up-and-comer merchant. I could have been rich! Now look at me. Driving a cart in a ghost-town, hoping to find buyers. You're probably confused and I get that... Haven't spoken to anyone in such a long time, it's hard to keep... coherent, you know?

Good question. I don't know. There's something very strange going on in that tower, and whatever it is, I feel like it's keeping me here. Of course, you can see that strange glowing barrier behind me, so here I am. I can't go any further in, but for some reason I can't seem to want to leave either.

Well... That's complicated. And not something I'd really like to get into. It wasn't all just one thing, either. I fled for my life when the warning bell rang. I didn't see what came out of the forest... but I could hear it. I'll never forget the sound.

A few days after I left the sky changed suddenly. A few days after that, I started feeling... something. I felt like I had to return to this place, and here I am now. I can't say how long I've been here, but as far as I know I'm the only one left. Plent of stock left to sell, if you're interested.
